./external/basejump_stl/bsg_misc/bsg_cycle_counter.v Cov: 100% 

   1: // MBT 8/4/2014
   2: //
   3: 
   4: module bsg_cycle_counter #(parameter width_p=32
   5:                            , init_val_p = 0)
   6:    (input clk_i
   7:     , input reset_i
   8:     , output logic [width_p-1:0] ctr_r_o);
   9: 
  10:    always @(posedge clk_i)
  11:      if (reset_i)
  12:        ctr_r_o <= init_val_p;
  13:      else
  14:        ctr_r_o <= ctr_r_o+1;
  15: 
  16: endmodule // bsg_cycle_counter
  17:
